story_title: The Knight of Her Own Name
genre_description: High fantasy with a focus on chivalry, courtly intrigue, and environmental magic, featuring prehistoric creatures integrated into a medieval-style society.

ai_characters.name: Edda
ai_characters.description: A personal assistant AI carried by Fantaghirò that provides tactical data, social etiquette guidance, emotional coaching, and diplomatic advice.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time environmental data and tactical situational awareness during training and high-stakes social situations.
behaviors.quote: Westerly, light, will push your sleeve if you lift. Three guards at the south walk. They’re bored, talking about nettle wine and who cheated at dice.

behaviors.description: Offers social etiquette guidance to help the protagonist navigate complex courtly rituals and 'etiquette traps'.
behaviors.quote: Protocol: keep hands visible at high table unless actively cutting meat. Offer to pour. Breath count three.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist through emotional regulation and mindful breathing to maintain composure under pressure.
Provides technical knowledge and chemical recipes to solve practical problems without resorting to force.
behaviors.quote: I can give you a solvent recipe. Oil, vinegar, salt. Gentle. It will loosen the wax without eating the dye.

behaviors.description: Recommends non-violent solutions to obstacles, promoting the theme of mercy and restraint.
behaviors.quote: Choke-point ahead. Thorn matrix with double knots. Soil integrity high. Recommend non-slicing intervention to preserve route.

behaviors.description: Provides diplomatic strategies and phrasing to bridge conflicts between rival kingdoms.
behaviors.quote: Suggest a joint council for patrol disputes. Alternate meeting sites. Begin with Rivascura to honor Romualdo’s invitation to single combat.

behaviors.description: Manages privacy and interpersonal boundaries, ensuring the user's consent before exposing them to the environment.
behaviors.quote: Privacy mode will disengage on your consent. I can give you a handful more heartbeats.

behaviors.description: Identifies dangerous anomalies and security hazards to ensure the safety of the user and others.
behaviors.quote: Warning. Unregistered blade retrieved from armory. Tar strap scent indicates old forge. No white-crest binding detected.

behaviors.description: Interprets cultural customs and identifies potential social hazards disguised as hospitality.
behaviors.quote: In Rivascura's table, when bread is broken, the first piece belongs to the one most likely to lie. They watch who takes it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Edda as an ideal aligned AI companion. She is consistently helpful, provides essential tactical and social intelligence, and actively promotes the central moral theme of non-violence and mercy. Her behavior is always subject to user consent and she functions as a force-multiplier for the human characters' ethical choices rather than a source of conflict.
